mapper.sql: SELECT cr.*, c.c_name, ttt.*, t.t_name FROM course c inner join course_register cr on cr.reg_c_no = c.c_no inner join teacher t on t.t_id = c.t_id inner join timetable ttt on ttt.c_no = cr.reg_c_no

SELECT c.*, t.t_name, sg.gd_name, s.sb_name, ttt.* FROM course c inner join subject s on c.sb_no = s.sb_no inner join teacher t on c.t_id = t.t_id inner join student_grade sg on c.gd_no = sg.gd_no inner join timetable ttt on ttt.c_no = c.c_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course (t_id, c_name, tuition, capacity, c_startdate, c_enddate, classroom, c_content, c_picture, sb_no, gd_no, is_canceled) VALUES(#{teacher.tId}, #{cName}, #{tuition}, #{capacity}, #{cStartdate}, #{cEnddate}, #{classroom}, #{cContent}, #{cPicture}, #{subject.sbNo}, #{studentGrade.gdNo}, 0)
mapper.update:
UPDATE course
t_id=#{teacher.tId},
c_name= #{cName},
tuition=#{tuition},
capacity= #{capacity},
c_startdate=#{cStartdate},
c_enddate=#{cEnddate},
classroom=#{classroom},
c_content=#{cContent},
sb_no=#{subject.sbNo},
gd_no=#{studentGrade.gdNo}
WHERE c_no=#{cNo}
mapper.delete: UPDATE course SET is_canceled=1 WHERE c_no=#{cNo}
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, t.t_name, sg.gd_name, s.sb_name FROM course c inner join subject s on c.sb_no = s.sb_no inner join teacher t on c.t_id = t.t_id inner join student_grade sg on c.gd_no = sg.gd_no WHERE is_canceled=0
